text: 14:7 Nehemia 9:6; Onger Akaba 124:8; Aposel 17:24; Akar Mogomem 10:6; 15:4Egha a pamten kamaghɨn mɨgei, “God gumazamizibar arazibar tuisɨghamin dughiam bar roghɨra ize. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia Godɨn atiating, egh ziar ekiam a danɨng. Ia, overiam ko nguazim ko ongarim ko nguazimɨn aven ivemarir dɨpabar ingarizir God, an ziam fɨ.”
